snippet: An uncommon sequence of events, including a corruption inquiry, has led Charlotte to the point where it will soon have its fourth mayor in less than a year.
abstract: Charlotte, NC, City Council is set to decide who will fill the balance of the term vacated by Mayor Patrick D Cannon, who resigned after his arrest by federal investigators for public corruption charges; uncommon sequence of events has led city to a point where it will have its fourth mayor in less than a year.
lead_paragraph: An uncommon sequence of events, including a corruption inquiry, has led Charlotte to the point where it will soon have its fourth mayor in less than a year.

headline.seo: Patrick Cannon’s Resignation Sets Stage for Charlotte’s Fourth Mayor in a Year
headline.main: Unusual Events Force Exceptional Turnover in Charlotte Mayor’s Office
headline.print_headline: In Charlotte, a Revolving Door in the Mayor’s Office: 4 in a Year
